Package be.helha.api_recettapp.controllers

Class RecipeComponentController

java.lang.Object
be.helha.api_recettapp.controllers.RecipeComponentController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/recipe-components") public class RecipeComponentController extends Object
REST controller for managing recipe components.

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public RecipeComponent getRecipeComponentById(@PathVariable int id)

      id - the ID of the recipe component.
      Returns:
      the requested RecipeComponent.
      Throws:

      Returns:
